author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows the changes introduced by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29152

The IOV range selection is now accessible from the IOVProxy interface. Tag description is now loaded only on explicit request.  

#### PR validation:

A unit test has been modified to exercise the new behaviour concerning the Tag description.
The rest of unit tests run as expected.
title: Clean up of CondDB interface
